dayOfMonth.description: The day of the month on which the appointment is scheduled to occur (if this field is used instead of the other repeats).

nthWeekOfMonth.description: The week of the month on which the appointment is scheduled to occur (if this field is used instead of the other repeats).

dayOfWeek.description: The day of the week on which the appointment is scheduled to occur (if this field is used instead of the other repeats).

monthInterval.description: The number of months between appointments. If present, then this overrides the duration period.
